alert.note: Alert for Gray; Haskell; Meade; Seward; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 7:13PM CDT until June 27 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Seward County in southwestern Kansas... Western Meade County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Stevens County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... Southeastern Haskell County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 713 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hugoton, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Woods around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Moscow, Cave, Satanta, Sublette, Tice and Copeland. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
